history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HB02002
FULL TITLE : AN ACT CREATING THE DAVAO INTERNATIONAL AIRPORT AUTHORITY TO ADMINISTER AND OPERATE THE FRANCISCO BANGOY INTERNATIONAL AIRPORT AND APPROPRIATING FUNDS THEREFOR
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : GARCIA-ALBANO, MYLENE J.
DATE FILED : 2016-07-27
SIGNIFICANCE: LOCAL
NATURE : Economic
CO-AUTHORS (Journal Entries) :
1. Nieto (000 2018-10-03)
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE
COMMITEE HEARINGS/ACTIONS:
      1. Deliberated upon by the Mother Committee on 2016-10-18
          -Bill approved by committee
      2. Transmitted to the Committee on Appropriations on 2016-11-07
          -Substitute bill transmitted, for comments on budgetary provisions
      3. Transmmitted to the Committee on Ways and Means on 2016-11-07
          -Substitute bill transmitted, for comments on tax provisions
      4. Referred to Stakeholders on 2017-01-31
          -Referred to the Department of Finance (DOF) for comments and/or recommendation.
      5. Referred to Stakeholders on 2017-01-31
          -Referred to the Department of Budget and Management (DBM) and the Department of Transportation (DOTr) for comments and/or recommendation.
MOTHER BILL: HB08691
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
REFERRAL TO THE COMMITTEE ON GOVERNMENT ENTERPRISES AND PRIVATIZATION ON 2016-08-08
SECONDARILY REFERRED TO THE COMMITTEE(S) ON TRANSPORTATION
